senses: [{"definition":"Countries or lands abroad.","example":null},{"definition":"Beyond the bounds of a country; in foreign countries.","example":null},{"definition":"At large; widely; broadly; over a wide space.","example":"A tree spreads its branches abroad."},{"definition":"Without a certain confine; outside the house; away from one's abode.","example":null},{"definition":"Before the public at large; throughout society or the world; here and there; moving without restriction.","example":null},{"definition":"Not on target; astray; in error; confused; dazed.","example":null},{"definition":"Played elsewhere than one's home grounds.","example":null},{"definition":"Throughout, over.","example":null}]
